title: What is Phishing?
content: Phishing is when attackers pretend to be trusted contacts to steal passwords, money, or data.

title: Urgency & Pressure
content: Messages that say 'act now or lose access' try to make you rush without thinking.

title: Links & Attachments
content: Avoid clicking unknown links or opening unexpected attachments. Verify first.

title: Sender Check
content: Inspect the sender’s address carefully — tiny misspellings are common tricks.

title: If You Clicked
content: Change your password and run a malware scan. Enable MFA to reduce damage.
